Producer: Andy Evans, Sean Marley, Ade Shannon, Sarah Townsend
Screenwriter: Andy Goddard, Suzy Eddie Izzard, Celyn Jones
Production Co: Mad As Birds, West Madison Entertainment
Synopsis: In the summer of 1939, influential families in Nazi Germany have sent their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for a future looking National Socialist. A teacher there sees what is coming and is trying to raise the alarm. But the authorities believe he is the problem.
Title: Six Minutes to Midnight
